project.title: Hortas conectadas - SAF do Futuro
project.description:
![Agroecologia e o caminho](https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/SxGmz_P6hryRF1ZF0Jgtwg7zBvm_AUxwpTpEM8Ns_9icOrYSH0BbI7OtNJM2iu1Uj4_FewE-dcrXRBS356Dvses=w1280)



# The Project

In this adventure, we are dedicated to creating an agroforestry system in the rural area of the city of São Paulo, at the Adalgisa and Manoel site, located in the Parelheiros neighborhood. The project also extends to squares, schools, associations and other idle spaces that could become community gardens or agroecological production spaces.

In this edition, we're going to extend our roots and actually plant where we have effective conditions to guarantee and monitor the long-term succession of the species, seeking to generate Web3Regen culture in the territory, impact the local ecosystem, research and act on the microclimate in the bioregion.

## The site

To this end, we will be relying on the support of the agroecology school's seed bank, which will guarantee the traceability of the crop, as well as partnerships with AgroforestDAO, which already maintains a syntropic system in the same biome and can occasionally collaborate with seedlings and seeds. We will also maintain our partnership with the Adalgiza and Manoel site to add to their production, we will also extend the proposals to other spaces that can offer security in the maintenance of the **gardens and agroforestry that will be validated, after a local mapping of other urban and agro-ecological gardens in the region, ecco will register these experiences onchain, collections will be created to give visibility and make it accessible so that other people in different places on the planet can participate and support these initiatives.

![Agroecologia é o caminho](https://lh4.googleusercontent.com/ijgpXadBrYplL012RyD4wZQAv_uA5xv9hZO-W4dEPmBRDrHEl3XUm57VTfl7mIYr3wDeFSzuiuH__WpiWIoHeRU=w1280)  

![Colheita do Feijao](https://lh4.googleusercontent.com/pVRxNX1ne_O-SJXva0rDvjgwvsBXvRgzUm4NcxJdXuJD5M1plZ9cVBYeVt1NoGHRYzz-gKbx1I_bxWS8ILCj0Ug26fTWaR-HR-VSoO_-yq2pLC77x8jV2bWm5qnh-d0CWQ=w1280)  

![Secando e debulhando](https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/m7mNrNeDsdfOHnQp1EjjtYF0xsQl_tHJmLKxNN8yDR-5qE1Dge83AqD_cujIytY3yxIRQRA4GRH0dawoY2roODk=w1280)  

![Polinizando outro tempo](https://lh5.googleusercontent.com/jWxqvnmgxrLWPIez-rI97y49wms3w_PzWYMwl6Qnk7k8cTKoFSjmaNdmmPe8F7iQ6aF5M6hAosEziYqmCIq39ps=w1280)  

![Verde](https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/xq0BPpVM-yFxSrsyzzxdhWxbtXVmF4wlUUhY_ti9GuF_nS4pkkfE6YVFpkiy0FBrCFzdvEouzX115h5KmcZb064=w1280)  

![Apoio mútuo e acao comunitária](https://lh5.googleusercontent.com/-Lm1sPJ08M4cFXVYHcO_DP0FjI1tpuq253BNypHxsw1P1yOY9aNVq_M8MjAbkwJHcu1BTTJnXA6WWuk4gXuo9I0=w1280)  

![Construindo nosso galinheiro de bambu](https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/-eduT7RrfnQ54nNTp756cT1CiTar6mGJcs2EeskoXY-cA-yDLyi6xwjtf9Jf-RXSuziqNMbH4bV8QxHvknhxNqY=w1280)  

This whole journey is intended to be **immersive and educational** for the people taking part, so that they can increasingly **take an interest in and appropriate web3Regen**.

# Background - What's happened and what's still here

![Contacao de historias na biblioteca](https://lh4.googleusercontent.com/ClKmbQCLiuW1O58J0CZ2iy4iiqlo8j6Q7dmY_SQmsDCWBWN4moli-tsf7E4OAJhD6HLtQWkVugM44qlzF4jubv9j-Kru-ybf4x_DCqHrVbT_zwpQf57jFKupTXErnSNJxA=w1280)


This story begins in 2019 with a Cultural Action project called **Ateliê Vivo** started by **Thiago Thalles (AgothA**), during his training in the **Programa Jovem Monitor Cultural**, this program of the São Paulo Secretary of Culture aims to train artists and cultural producers to work with Public Policies in their own territories.

The project was carried out in an idle space outside a public library and began with invitations and calls for sessions of role-playing games, evolved into juggling classes and training, storytelling presentations and reading mediation and conversation circles, until from these cultural activities a cohesive local group had formed, willing to clean up squares and implement a community garden in the baiiro library. We started by holding fairs to exchange seeds and seedlings, we prepared the soil and **received children from the surrounding schools who came to plant their beans**.

It became clear how **this project had a positive impact on the community**, bringing together people with similar interests, who began to feel a greater sense of belonging in relation to the public facilities, their own neighborhood and especially **in relation to Nature, as a land, as an entity, as a living, interconnected organism**.

With this experience in their luggage, during the context of the Covid-19 global pandemic, the people who were involved in this process continued to deepen their relationships to the point where they organized themselves around an initiative called **Di.Verso.Mundo**, which sought to connect people with the same concerns more broadly. Some time later, this initiative would become the game E-Cco@Z, but that's another story. In the next section, we'll talk about the second edition of Ateliê Vivo at the Parelheiros Agroecology School.

![Atelie na EAP](https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/cK5ZU35m_GPSJZjqLSE0WsFO7HzGU3vJJS1TAJBlmriXD1G0rApATIMEzP9OSrNttHP5AQIT1R9FDRPhPWoQ1d8dJltE4QOs42vgz4qrNbyyL4opovznH0_-ShZLyGku9Q=w1280)


# A synergy of forms 

The second edition of the Vivo workshop was held in 2021 at the **Escola de Agroecologia de Parelheiros**, this time as part of the internship plan for the Arts/Theatre degree course at the Arts Institute of UNESP (Universidade Estadual Paulista), where we began by reproducing the same structure with cultural actions, involving orality and narrative games, as well as raising awareness and feeling the body in the space with open juggling classes and training, we also mediated reading and started what would later become one of our main Environmental Education activities, the **Ecco Cine Club**.  As the school itself, although recently inaugurated, already had a substantial team working on the management of the pedagogical garden, we took advantage of this large classroom to energize the **Permaculture Study and Practice Group**, where in addition to planning and technical discussion on the demands of the school itself and the park where it is located, We made handicrafts and art, collecting raw materials such as bamboo, clay, earth with different pigments, leaves, twigs, and made everything from clay dolls, multi-rayon painting with geo-paint, photo displays, Christmas decorations and other toys. It was 21 months of a lot of fun and learning. 

This was also the period when we started playing the stigmergic game **Pega Visao Camps** and started producing more material on the web about traditional stories, cybernetics, and current affairs in general.

# Today

Finally, we have reached the third and current phase of Atelie Vivo, which since 2023 has been **touring educational and cultural spaces**, promoting the Ecco Cine Club and holding **Fanzine Making Workshops** for audiences of all ages. In these workshops, we go through a process of sensitization, reflect on our relationship with the environment and use simple materials to express our points of view. From the material created, we can move on to producing digital art and creating NFTs that represent regenerative actions in the real world and incorporate this audience into the emerging web3.

![Oficina de Zine](https://lh4.googleusercontent.com/RyQvpcPWrxd9aKerkkzGccfcu2vt_-OkerrDEdy9UI-ZkIoleVwbIK05GkbBiBnM4X-3lComW2OkFpYojpDh81XzKua-8q-jLDDImTp1mmtoUzb4Ss_-JmlOvzhho0uYzQ=w1280)

In 2024 the project took place in a **hybrid format and radicalized in Web3 research, cooperating in a network, energizing and collaborating with local initiatives, in addition to Sitio Adalgisa & Manuel, **O NUPECI** (CITA's Permaculture Center), and glocal ones, such as the **ReRe** cybercultural protocol with the Stigmergic Game Pega Visão Camps, with AgroforestDAO and with the **Green Pill Brasil** community.


-----------Portugues -----------

![Agroecologia e o caminho](https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/SxGmz_P6hryRF1ZF0Jgtwg7zBvm_AUxwpTpEM8Ns_9icOrYSH0BbI7OtNJM2iu1Uj4_FewE-dcrXRBS356Dvses=w1280)


# O Projeto

Nesta aventura nos dedicamos a **criacao de um sistema agroflorestal na zona rural da cidade de Sao Paulo, no Sítio Adalgisa e Manoel**, localizado no bairro de Parelheiros. O projeto também se estende para **pracas, escolas, associacoes e outros espacos ociosos que possam se tranformar em hortas comunitárias ou espacos de producao agroecológica**. 

Nesta edicao vamos extender nossas raizes e efetivamente **plantar onde tenhamos condicoes efetivas de garantir e acompanhar a sucessao das espécies** a longo prazo, buscando **gerar cultura Web3Regen no território, impactar o ecossistema local, pesquisar e agir no microclima na biorregiao**. 

![Sitio](https://lh5.googleusercontent.com/Q64YtUxmEVZsRYlSGz0WsRQ2R8f6BAmZ4gsHkxVsyRrOXD7dQxEPwn4MuwqaH2YqdXXLHWWnHbPGJrPdp0GHTArwFa-pjke8KojEa6TRAvYyOXxlzbhk8f_GkCUEj6P5pA=w1280)

Para isso vamos contar com o apoio do **banco de sementes da escola de agroecologia** que irá **garantir a rastreabilidade do cultivo**, assim como com parcerias com **AgroforestDAO** que ja mantém um sistema sintropico no mesmo bioma e ocasionalmente poderá colaborar com mudas e sementes, também vamos manter nossa parceria com o sitio Adalgiza e Manoel para **agregar em sua producao**, vamos extender também a propostas para outros espacos que possam oferecer seguranca na manutencao das **hortas e agroflorestas que serão validadas, após um **mapeamento local de outras hortas urbanas e agroelogógicas na regiao**, a ecco vai fazer o **registro onchain** dessas experiencias, **serao criadas colecoes para dar visibilidade e tornar acessível para que outras pessoas em diferentes lugares do planeta possam participar e apoiar essas iniciativas**. 

![Agroecologia é o caminho](https://lh4.googleusercontent.com/ijgpXadBrYplL012RyD4wZQAv_uA5xv9hZO-W4dEPmBRDrHEl3XUm57VTfl7mIYr3wDeFSzuiuH__WpiWIoHeRU=w1280)  

![Colheita do Feijao](https://lh4.googleusercontent.com/pVRxNX1ne_O-SJXva0rDvjgwvsBXvRgzUm4NcxJdXuJD5M1plZ9cVBYeVt1NoGHRYzz-gKbx1I_bxWS8ILCj0Ug26fTWaR-HR-VSoO_-yq2pLC77x8jV2bWm5qnh-d0CWQ=w1280)  

![Secando e debulhando](https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/m7mNrNeDsdfOHnQp1EjjtYF0xsQl_tHJmLKxNN8yDR-5qE1Dge83AqD_cujIytY3yxIRQRA4GRH0dawoY2roODk=w1280)  

![Polinizando outro tempo](https://lh5.googleusercontent.com/jWxqvnmgxrLWPIez-rI97y49wms3w_PzWYMwl6Qnk7k8cTKoFSjmaNdmmPe8F7iQ6aF5M6hAosEziYqmCIq39ps=w1280)  

![Verde](https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/xq0BPpVM-yFxSrsyzzxdhWxbtXVmF4wlUUhY_ti9GuF_nS4pkkfE6YVFpkiy0FBrCFzdvEouzX115h5KmcZb064=w1280)  

![Apoio mútuo e acao comunitária](https://lh5.googleusercontent.com/-Lm1sPJ08M4cFXVYHcO_DP0FjI1tpuq253BNypHxsw1P1yOY9aNVq_M8MjAbkwJHcu1BTTJnXA6WWuk4gXuo9I0=w1280)  

![Construindo nosso galinheiro de bambu](https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/-eduT7RrfnQ54nNTp756cT1CiTar6mGJcs2EeskoXY-cA-yDLyi6xwjtf9Jf-RXSuziqNMbH4bV8QxHvknhxNqY=w1280)  

Todo esse percurso visa ser **imersivo e educativo** para as pessoas participantes, de modo que possam cada vez mais **ter interesse e se apropriar da web3Regen**.

# Antecedentes - O que se passou e ainda está aqui

![Contacao de historias na biblioteca](https://lh4.googleusercontent.com/ClKmbQCLiuW1O58J0CZ2iy4iiqlo8j6Q7dmY_SQmsDCWBWN4moli-tsf7E4OAJhD6HLtQWkVugM44qlzF4jubv9j-Kru-ybf4x_DCqHrVbT_zwpQf57jFKupTXErnSNJxA=w1280)

Essa história comeca em 2019 com um projeto de Acao Cultural chamado **Ateliê Vivo** iniciado por **Thiago Thalles (AgothA**), durante sua formacao no **Programa Jovem Monitor Cultural**, este programa da Secretaria de Cultura de Sao Paulo tem como objetivo capacitar artistas e produtores culturais para atuar com Políticas Publicas em seus próprios territórios.

O projeto, foi realizado num **espaco ocioso da àrea externa de uma biblioteca publica** e iniciou com convites e chamamentos para secoes de **jogos de RPG, evoluiu para aulas e treinos de malabares, apresentacao de contacao de histórias e mediacao de leitura e rodas de conversa**, até que a partir dessas atividades culturais, havia se formado um grupo local coeso e disposto a realizar **limpezas em pracas e implementar uma horta comunitária** na biblioteca do baiiro. Comecamos realizando feirinhas de trocas de sementes e mudas, preparamos o solo e **recebemos criancas das escolas ao redor que vieram plantar seus feijoes**.

Ficou visivel como **esse projeto impactou positivamente a comunidade**, juntou pessoas com interesses semelhantes, que passaram a ter mais sentimento de pertencimento em relacao ao equipamento publico, ao proprio bairro e principalmente **em relacao à A Natureza, como terra, como ente, como organismo vivo, interconectado**.

Com essa experiencia na bagagem, durante o contexto de pandemia global de Covid 19, as pessoas que se articularam nesse processo continuaram aprofundando relacionamentos ao ponto de se organizarem em torno de uma iniciativa chamada **Di.Verso.Mundo**, que buscava conectar de forma mais ampla pessoas com as mesmas inquietacoes, algum tempo depois essa iniciativa se transformaria no game E-Cco@Z, mas essa é uma outra história, no proximo trecho vamos falar sobre a segunda edicao do Ateliê Vivo na Escola de Agroecologia de Parelheiros.

![Atelie na EAP](https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/cK5ZU35m_GPSJZjqLSE0WsFO7HzGU3vJJS1TAJBlmriXD1G0rApATIMEzP9OSrNttHP5AQIT1R9FDRPhPWoQ1d8dJltE4QOs42vgz4qrNbyyL4opovznH0_-ShZLyGku9Q=w1280)


# Uma Sinergia de formas 

A segunda edicao do ateliê Vivo foi realizada em 2021 na **Escola de Agroecologia de Parelheiros**, dessa vez como parte do plano de estágio do curso de Licenciatura em Artes / Teatro do Instituto de Artes da UNESP (Universidade Estadual Paulista), na ocasiao comecamos reproduzindo a mesma estrutura com acoes culturais, envolvendo a oralidade e jogos narrativos, além de sensibilizar e sentir o corpo no espaco com aulas e treinos abertos de malabares, também fizemos mediacao de leitura e demos inicio ao que posteriormente viria a ser uma de nossas principais atividades de Educacao Ambiental, o **Ecco Cine Clube**.  Como a propria escola, apesar de recentemente inaugurada, já tinha um trabalho substancial e equipe para o manejo da horta pedagógica, aproveitamos essa ampla sala de aula para energizar o **Grupo de Estudos e Práticas de Permacultura**, em que além do planejamento e discussao técnica sobre demandas da propria escola e do parque onde esta instalada, realizamos trabalhos manuais e artísticos, colhendo matérias primas, como bambu, argila, terra com diferentes pigmentos, folhas, galhos, e fizemos desde bonecos de argila, multirao de pintura com geotinta, expositores de fotografias, enfeites de natal e outros brinquedos, foram 21 meses de muita diversao e aprendizado. 

Este também foi o periodo que comecamos a jogar o game estigmérgico **Pega Visao Camps** e passamos a produzir mais materiais na web sobre histórias tradicionais, cibernética, e atualidade de forma geral.

# Hoje

Por fim chegamos na terceira e atual fase do Atelie Vivo, que desde 2023 vem **percorrendo espacos de educacao e cultura** promovendo o Ecco Cine Clube e fazendo **Oficinas de Confeccao de Fanzine** para publicos de todas as idades. Nessas oficinas, passamos por um processo de sensibilizacao, refletimos sobre nossa relacao com o meio e utilizamos materiais simples para expressar nossos pontos de vista. A partir do material criado podemos avancar para producao de arte digital e criacao de NFT`s que representem acoes regenerativas no mundo real e incrporar esse publico à  emergente web3

![Oficina de Zine](https://lh4.googleusercontent.com/RyQvpcPWrxd9aKerkkzGccfcu2vt_-OkerrDEdy9UI-ZkIoleVwbIK05GkbBiBnM4X-3lComW2OkFpYojpDh81XzKua-8q-jLDDImTp1mmtoUzb4Ss_-JmlOvzhho0uYzQ=w1280)

Em 2024 o projeto aconteceu em formato **híbrido e radicalizou na pesquisa Web3, cooperando em rede, energizando e colaborando com iniciativas locais, além  do Sitio Adalgisa & Manuel, **O NUPECI** (Núcleo de Permacultura do CITA), e glocais, como o **Protocolo cibercultural ReRe** com o Game Estigmérgico Pega Visão Camps, com AgroforestDAO e com a comunidade **Green Pill Brasil**

metadata.title: Hortas conectadas - SAF do Futuro
metadata.description:
# the Project

[![Design-sem-nome(3).png](https://cdn.charmverse.io/user-content/4bfdc878-baa5-4978-9d8a-df313b23eaa5/c31c0f48-65af-4f7d-88d6-8d452352b720/Design-sem-nome(3).png)](https://cdn.charmverse.io/user-content/4bfdc878-baa5-4978-9d8a-df313b23eaa5/c31c0f48-65af-4f7d-88d6-8d452352b720/Design-sem-nome(3).png)

## Planting



This is a long-term project and in this adventure our goal is concentrated in the carbon grounding in a small fragment of Mata Atlantica where a family cagroecologic production is already there, in this way we will dedicate ourselves to the implementation of an Agroforestry System in the rural area of the city of Sao Paulo, in the Adalgisa and Manoel Site, located in the neighborhood of Parelheiros.

[![mapasitio1.png](https://cdn.charmverse.io/user-content/4bfdc878-baa5-4978-9d8a-df313b23eaa5/40199374-2aa3-427e-99f7-a911095e58eb/mapasitio1.png)](https://cdn.charmverse.io/user-content/4bfdc878-baa5-4978-9d8a-df313b23eaa5/40199374-2aa3-427e-99f7-a911095e58eb/mapasitio1.png)

[![2.png](https://cdn.charmverse.io/user-content/4bfdc878-baa5-4978-9d8a-df313b23eaa5/dc69b29d-7733-4e66-a42c-745466ed5e39/2.png)](https://cdn.charmverse.io/user-content/4bfdc878-baa5-4978-9d8a-df313b23eaa5/dc69b29d-7733-4e66-a42c-745466ed5e39/2.png)

[![4.png](https://cdn.charmverse.io/user-content/4bfdc878-baa5-4978-9d8a-df313b23eaa5/223abd23-8347-4472-a707-e9a8a2084a6b/4.png)](https://cdn.charmverse.io/user-content/4bfdc878-baa5-4978-9d8a-df313b23eaa5/223abd23-8347-4472-a707-e9a8a2084a6b/4.png)

[![3.png](https://cdn.charmverse.io/user-content/4bfdc878-baa5-4978-9d8a-df313b23eaa5/6489db5a-6819-4d9c-ae41-5b07fa7d87af/3.png)](https://cdn.charmverse.io/user-content/4bfdc878-baa5-4978-9d8a-df313b23eaa5/6489db5a-6819-4d9c-ae41-5b07fa7d87af/3.png)

[![5.png](https://cdn.charmverse.io/user-content/4bfdc878-baa5-4978-9d8a-df313b23eaa5/7d11dfaf-f1b6-4386-b872-49866bb42488/5.png)](https://cdn.charmverse.io/user-content/4bfdc878-baa5-4978-9d8a-df313b23eaa5/7d11dfaf-f1b6-4386-b872-49866bb42488/5.png)

[![8.png](https://cdn.charmverse.io/user-content/4bfdc878-baa5-4978-9d8a-df313b23eaa5/992a6726-46e0-46c6-8521-27f334fcf9fd/8.png)](https://cdn.charmverse.io/user-content/4bfdc878-baa5-4978-9d8a-df313b23eaa5/992a6726-46e0-46c6-8521-27f334fcf9fd/8.png)

[![6.png](https://cdn.charmverse.io/user-content/4bfdc878-baa5-4978-9d8a-df313b23eaa5/57eb94e1-937d-4e71-86ca-e897d97a6482/6.png)](https://cdn.charmverse.io/user-content/4bfdc878-baa5-4978-9d8a-df313b23eaa5/57eb94e1-937d-4e71-86ca-e897d97a6482/6.png)

For this, in addition to AgroforestDAO, especially the SAF do Morro da Redencao, belonging to the same biome, we will count on the support of the seed bank of the School of Agroecology of Parelheiros that can also guarantee the traceability and quality of its seeds and seedlings.



The planting in the current site of the Adalgiza and Manoel Site, as well as in the school is varied, being cultivated many PANCS such as edible flowers, fish, pour, different potatoes... Small rocks with corn, feijao, cassava, almonds, cabaca; as well as are cultivated gardens, with cabbs, aboboras, tomatoes, peppers to aromatic and medicinal herbs such as mints, lemon trees, grasses, penicillin, I trust, in both genetic matrices are cultivated many fruit species, quite bananas, different sJabuticabas... soon, by aptidao climatic we will maintain this pattern of planting, but in the SAF of the Future we want to highlight the character of this native forest privileging the Cambuci planting, a characteristic fruit in the region and important for the local culture, where even annually promotes a great gastronomic event bringing together producers from different places of the state, the Cambuci Route.  A curiosity is that this peculiar fruit, which looks like a spaceship, is precisely developed under ideal conditions in forest undergroves, exactly as is the fragment that we will intervene.

[![cambuci.jpg](https://cdn.charmverse.io/user-content/4bfdc878-baa5-4978-9d8a-df313b23eaa5/8cbcd475-abd5-41ff-bf71-80865fb5994d/cambuci.jpg)](https://cdn.charmverse.io/user-content/4bfdc878-baa5-4978-9d8a-df313b23eaa5/8cbcd475-abd5-41ff-bf71-80865fb5994d/cambuci.jpg)

principle our planning follows to plant these species in line in order to facilitate daily management and work with light machinery. We will use the resources that are available, but our interest is at a time amis to aggregate the solutions necessary to facilitate management, improve data analysis methods, understand the impact of the experience and benefit the microclimate and ecosystem in the present and in the future.



To generate more impact in the carbon sequestration process, we want to collaborate and plan the succession of cambuci planting to other species such as Jussara, Ingá, Ipe, Pitanga, Guapuruvu, among others, both to cover the soil, such as alaslyasm, until generating soil cover rich in nitrogen, such as guandu.



After a local mapping of other urban gardens, pracas, schools, associations and agro-gosgage in the region, we would also like to connect and extend the proposal for other spaces that can offer security in the maintenance of gardens or fragments in reprocessing reforestation where food will be cultivated.



Let's do the onchain record of these experiences in audio, video and textual. With this collective material, collections of NFT's will be created to give visibility and make available means to other people, in different places of the globe, who also wish to regenate the planet of human impacts, even from afar, can actively participate and support these glocal initiatives. It is very important to say that this whole path aims to be immersive and educational for people who throughout the journey will make contact with this initiative, so that they can increasingly take an interest and appropriate concepts and tools of the web3 and its layers, especially the emerging Regen.

# Background:
## What happened and is still here

[![1.png](https://cdn.charmverse.io/user-content/4bfdc878-baa5-4978-9d8a-df313b23eaa5/f4968bf3-abad-4e78-a514-d6cf7389574f/1.png)](https://cdn.charmverse.io/user-content/4bfdc878-baa5-4978-9d8a-df313b23eaa5/f4968bf3-abad-4e78-a514-d6cf7389574f/1.png)

This story begins in 2019 with a Cultural Action project called Ateliê Vivo initiated by Thiago Thalles (AgothA), during his training in the Youth Cultural Monitor Program, this program of the Secretariat of Culture of Sao Paulo aims to train artists and cultural producers to act with Public Policies in their own territories, the project, which was carried out in an oyxic space of the external area of a library had as objective the environmental sensitisation in the territory and began with theof stories and reading mediation, conversation circles, until from these cultural activities, there was formed a cohesive local group and willing to perform cleanings in pracas and implement a community garden in an ocioco space in the outer area of the library of baiiro. We start performing feirs of seed exchanges and seedlings, prepared the soil and received children from the surrounding schools that came to plant their feijoes.

[![6.png](https://cdn.charmverse.io/user-content/4bfdc878-baa5-4978-9d8a-df313b23eaa5/dc469c8c-adcb-4efd-a1b8-a15608e0fa4c/6.png)](https://cdn.charmverse.io/user-content/4bfdc878-baa5-4978-9d8a-df313b23eaa5/dc469c8c-adcb-4efd-a1b8-a15608e0fa4c/6.png)

[![3.png](https://cdn.charmverse.io/user-content/4bfdc878-baa5-4978-9d8a-df313b23eaa5/67e6f6ba-5b3f-428e-a6ed-ce96f525a6dd/3.png)](https://cdn.charmverse.io/user-content/4bfdc878-baa5-4978-9d8a-df313b23eaa5/67e6f6ba-5b3f-428e-a6ed-ce96f525a6dd/3.png)

[![4.png](https://cdn.charmverse.io/user-content/4bfdc878-baa5-4978-9d8a-df313b23eaa5/5a562354-c76a-40d0-a1e1-44e1d667c5c8/4.png)](https://cdn.charmverse.io/user-content/4bfdc878-baa5-4978-9d8a-df313b23eaa5/5a562354-c76a-40d0-a1e1-44e1d667c5c8/4.png)

[![2.png](https://cdn.charmverse.io/user-content/4bfdc878-baa5-4978-9d8a-df313b23eaa5/b20b1090-7b71-4e4a-a652-982f7933774a/2.png)](https://cdn.charmverse.io/user-content/4bfdc878-baa5-4978-9d8a-df313b23eaa5/b20b1090-7b71-4e4a-a652-982f7933774a/2.png)

## A Synergy of Forms

[![Sinergia-na-paisagem-da-eap.jpeg](https://cdn.charmverse.io/user-content/4bfdc878-baa5-4978-9d8a-df313b23eaa5/a63ba0c3-fd1d-4f59-a698-0e1016b8397b/Sinergia-na-paisagem-da-eap.jpeg)](https://cdn.charmverse.io/user-content/4bfdc878-baa5-4978-9d8a-df313b23eaa5/a63ba0c3-fd1d-4f59-a698-0e1016b8397b/Sinergia-na-paisagem-da-eap.jpeg)

The second era of the Atelier Vivo was held in 2021 at the School of Agroecology of Parelheiros, this time as part of the internship plan of the course of Degree in Arts / Theater of the Institute of Arts of the UNESP (Universidade Estadual Paulista), at the beginning we began reproducing the same structure with cultural actions, involving oral and narrative games, in addition to sensitizing and feeling the body in the space.to be one of our main activities of Environmental Education, the Ecco Cine Clube, as the school itself, although recently inaugurated already had a substantial work and team for the management of the pedagogical garden, we took advantage of this large classroom to energize the Group of Studies and Practices of Permaculture, in which in addition to the planning and technical discussion about the demands of the school itself and the park where it is installed, we carry out manual and artistic work, with thewe have done since clay dolls, multirao paint with geoink, exhibitors of photographs, Christmas ornaments and other toys, were 21 months of much diverse and learning.

[![gif-atelie-eap.gif](https://cdn.charmverse.io/user-content/4bfdc878-baa5-4978-9d8a-df313b23eaa5/d80ccc0f-7180-4ba2-a15b-96822754237a/gif-atelie-eap.gif)](https://cdn.charmverse.io/user-content/4bfdc878-baa5-4978-9d8a-df313b23eaa5/d80ccc0f-7180-4ba2-a15b-96822754237a/gif-atelie-eap.gif)

[![12.png](https://cdn.charmverse.io/user-content/4bfdc878-baa5-4978-9d8a-df313b23eaa5/b6b1631a-098a-47f3-a0c7-f8daa04e8b9c/12.png)](https://cdn.charmverse.io/user-content/4bfdc878-baa5-4978-9d8a-df313b23eaa5/b6b1631a-098a-47f3-a0c7-f8daa04e8b9c/12.png)

This was also the period that we started playing the stigmergic game Pega Visao Camps and we started to produce more materials on the web about traditional stories, cybernetics, and current affairs in general.

[![1fac750b-fefe-4dee-b906-5ebd5d531760/87a45ba2.jpg](https://cdn.charmverse.io/user-content/4bfdc878-baa5-4978-9d8a-df313b23eaa5/1fac750b-fefe-4dee-b906-5ebd5d531760/87a45ba2.jpg)](https://cdn.charmverse.io/user-content/4bfdc878-baa5-4978-9d8a-df313b23eaa5/1fac750b-fefe-4dee-b906-5ebd5d531760/87a45ba2.jpg)

## Today

Finally we arrive at the third and current phase of Atelie Vivo, which since 2023 has been traversing spaces of education and culture promoting the Ecco Cine Club and more recentmete ministering fanzine confeccasine workshops for publicists of all ages. In these workshops, we go through a process of sensitization, we reflect on our relationship with the medium and use simple materials to express our points of view.

[![photo_2024-12-13-15.18.23.jpeg](https://cdn.charmverse.io/user-content/4bfdc878-baa5-4978-9d8a-df313b23eaa5/09a189a6-e031-48ab-a4ee-182cdc864213/photo_2024-12-13-15.18.23.jpeg)](https://cdn.charmverse.io/user-content/4bfdc878-baa5-4978-9d8a-df313b23eaa5/09a189a6-e031-48ab-a4ee-182cdc864213/photo_2024-12-13-15.18.23.jpeg)

[![photo_2024-12-13-15.18.56.jpeg](https://cdn.charmverse.io/user-content/4bfdc878-baa5-4978-9d8a-df313b23eaa5/60d6a1ce-1933-477d-bce0-b55bd7bbf873/photo_2024-12-13-15.18.56.jpeg)](https://cdn.charmverse.io/user-content/4bfdc878-baa5-4978-9d8a-df313b23eaa5/60d6a1ce-1933-477d-bce0-b55bd7bbf873/photo_2024-12-13-15.18.56.jpeg)

[![photo_2024-12-13-15.19.06.jpeg](https://cdn.charmverse.io/user-content/4bfdc878-baa5-4978-9d8a-df313b23eaa5/af11d254-59b3-4fdf-b525-2b186ab6d307/photo_2024-12-13-15.19.06.jpeg)](https://cdn.charmverse.io/user-content/4bfdc878-baa5-4978-9d8a-df313b23eaa5/af11d254-59b3-4fdf-b525-2b186ab6d307/photo_2024-12-13-15.19.06.jpeg)

From the material created we can advance for digital art production and creation of NFTs that represent regenerative stocks in the real world.

## Media Arthivism

[![APIB.jpg](https://cdn.charmverse.io/user-content/4bfdc878-baa5-4978-9d8a-df313b23eaa5/9de3fada-7106-4939-8e53-dafbf3b85342/APIB.jpg)](https://cdn.charmverse.io/user-content/4bfdc878-baa5-4978-9d8a-df313b23eaa5/9de3fada-7106-4939-8e53-dafbf3b85342/APIB.jpg)

"in-gation" in-gives, conveying information about socio-environmental issues and giving visibility to movements, events and actions in favor of the environment through our social media, also so we document our path and this journey of incubating the future to connect productive space.

project.title: Ecovillage Network in Ukraine: Implementing climate solutions for resilient communities in the context of war.
project.description:
### Our Story

The Global Ecovillage Network of Ukraine (GEN Ukraine) is a national organization founded in 2018 that unites approximately 60 ecovillages across the country. Our mission is to create resilient and self-sufficient communities that live in harmony with nature, using regenerative practices to ensure sustainable living.

![ecovillage map](https://miro.medium.com/v2/resize:fit:1400/format:webp/1*p0W20fBbTbYiGhaNEUOa1w.png)

### Our Principles

- **Permaculture**: We employ permaculture methods to create sustainable agricultural systems that minimize environmental impact.
- **Regenerative Agriculture**: We restore natural ecosystems through regenerative farming and agroforestry.
- **Social Responsibility**: We build communities based on sociocracy and non-violent communication principles.

### Climate Impact

1. **Reducing Greenhouse Gas Emissions**
   - **Renewable Energy**: We use solar, wind, and bioenergy to reduce reliance on fossil fuels.
   - **Energy Efficiency**: We implement energy-efficient technologies in construction and resource management.

2. **Biodiversity Conservation**
   - **Regenerative Farming**: We enhance soil fertility and biodiversity by integrating forest systems into agroecosystems.
   - **Protecting Natural Landscapes**: We safeguard natural landscapes from degradation and development.

3. **Land Use Changes**
   - **Reducing Deforestation**: We support reforestation programs and reduce deforestation.
   - **Sustainable Land Management**: We adopt sustainable land management practices that preserve soil and water resources.

4. **Education and Awareness**
   - **Training Programs**: We organize training programs for local communities and youth on sustainable development and climate protection.
   - **Environmental Education**: We conduct environmental education for children and adults, fostering ecological awareness.

Our Climate Impact Metrics Report in [Github](https://github.com/maxzalevski/climate_solutions/tree/main)

### Our Achievements

![community building](https://genukraine.com.ua/images/2023/05/21/img_5043.jpg)

- **Community Spaces**: We develop shared spaces for regenerative practices and learning, such as the Om Center in Tepla Gora, Soul Space in Busha, and children's spaces in Svyachene and Vasylivka. Youth volunteer camps such as the Circle of Forest and craft workshops such as Kazkove, Byshkin, Velyka Rodyna, and Kupelia. We are supporting and developing 20 more common spaces.

We have installed or are in the process of installing in the last 12 months:
- 10 solar stations in the villages (Charivne, Omelyanivka, Zeleni Kruchi, Prostir Lyubov, Vasylivka, Tepla Hora, Ladoslavne, Zhyvy Dom, Zhyva Hata)
- 6 power stations Bluetti 600 Whatt, used as an alternative to diesel generators in blackout conditions
- Multifunctional batteries and power banks for routers, developed based on bike workshops

- **Innovative Technologies**: We implement water collection and recycling systems like VodaLab, providing clean water for communities.

---

### Allocation of Funds for Gitcoin Grants Round #GG21: Climate Solutions

We plan to allocate the raised funds to the following initiatives:

1. **Climate Solutions Conference**:
   At the end of September, we will hold a conference at the Hlyboki Balyky eco-station titled "Ukrainian Eco Makers Camp: Making Things Work During the War." (Coordinator Bogdan Popov)
   The conference will cover topics such as energy, water, food, community, and biodiversity.

Create and publish a catalogue of climate solutions in our communities in the context of war.
(Coordinator Maksym Zalevskyi)

2. **Installation of Rainwater Harvesting Systems**:
   We plan to install rainwater harvesting systems in six common spaces:
   - Omelianivka (Coordinator: Oleksander Stepanov)
   - Vasylivka (Coordinator: Andriy Koyda)
   - Velyka Rodyna (Coordinator: Olga Sklez)
   - Byshkyn (Coordinator: Borys Shestopalov)
   - Kazkove (Coordinator: Ivan Reshta)
   - Charyvne (Coordinator: Olga Redko)

3. **Solar Stations in Frontline Areas**:
   Solar stations will be installed in three spaces facing significant electricity problems:
   - Vasylivka (Coordinator: Andriy Koyda)
   - Svitankove (Coordinator: Vyacheslav Bohdanov)
   - Byshkyn (Coordinator: Borys Shestopalov)

4. **Windmill in Ladoslavne**:
   A windmill will be installed in the Ladoslavne settlement, which has been affected by bombing, to provide an alternative energy source. (Coordinator: Anatoliy)

### Challenges and Prospects

We face numerous challenges, particularly the need for scientific research to validate our practices. However, with the support of international funds and crypto grants, we can continue to develop our ecovillages and expand our impact.

List of Our Mistakes in Implementing the First Round of Gitcoin Grant [here](https://github.com/maxzalevski/grants/issues/1)

### Operating Under Difficult Conditions

Since our founding, we have been operating under extremely challenging conditions, including war, migration, blackouts, and severe economic and energy crises. In these circumstances, our decentralized network has become a vital source of resilience and survival amidst societal collapse.

### Conclusion
![common space Busha opening](https://miro.medium.com/v2/resize:fit:1400/format:webp/1*JgtiCNwkTAYUVDWCkAd2OA.jpeg)

GEN Ukraine strives to be a leader in sustainable development and climate protection. Our communities exemplify how to live in harmony with nature, reducing negative environmental impacts and creating a sustainable future for generations to come.

project.title: Sasaki Agroforestry
project.description:
**EN:** The Sasaki Farm, located in São Miguel Arcanjo/SP, belongs to a family of **Japanese immigrants** from the far north of Japan who **arrived in Brazil in 1930** and have lived there **since 1950**. Until 1990, the family conventionally planted fruits and vegetables. In 2017, after decades without agricultural production, the third generation of the family learned about Agroforestry techniques and felt it could be a possible way to **revitalize that ancestral space**. The family began to implement small modules of **Agroecological Agroforestry Systems** to regenerate the site with **biodiversity, abundance and cultural recovery**. Currently, the site has 1 hectare of Agroforestry Systems and Mandalas of medicinal herbs. In addition to Successional Agroforestry techniques, we apply **Soil Health** techniques, such as Bokashi, Microorganisms, Biofertilizers and Pfeiffer Chromatography. 

**Goals for Summer / 2025**

1) Management of the Agroforestry System #5 (focus on roots and citrus fruits);
2) Planting of 500m² of corn and beans for seed multiplication.

> ---
> 
**PT:** O Sítio Sasaki, localizado em São Miguel Arcanjo / SP, é de uma família de imigrantes japoneses, do extremo norte do Japão, que chegou ao Brasil em 1930 e onde vivem desde 1950. Até 1990, a família plantava frutas e vegetais de forma convencional. Em 2017, após décadas sem produção agrícola, a terceira geração da família conheceu as técnicas de Agrofloresta e sentiu que poderia ser uma maneira possível de revitalizar aquele espaço ancestral. A família começou a implementar pequenos módulos de Sistemas Agroflorestais Agroecológicos para regenerar o sítio com biodiversidade, abundância e resgate cultural. Atualmente, o local conta com 1 hectare de cultivo de Sistemas Agroflorestais e Mandalas de ervas medicinais. Além das técnicas de Agrofloresta Sucessional, aplicamos técnicas de Sáude no Solo, como Bokashi, Microorganismos, Biofertilizantes e Cromatografia de Pfeiffer.

**Metas para Verão / 2025**

1) Manejo do SAF 5 (foco em raízes e cítricos)
2) Plantio de roça de 500m² de milho e feijão para multiplicação de sementes.

> ---

[![IMG_2818.JPG](https://cdn.charmverse.io/user-content/fa5063ad-9188-4ac3-9f20-8e52fee6fa5c/f0121b6b-b928-4af3-b249-dc7f47040b4f/IMG_2818.JPG)](https://cdn.charmverse.io/user-content/fa5063ad-9188-4ac3-9f20-8e52fee6fa5c/f0121b6b-b928-4af3-b249-dc7f47040b4f/IMG_2818.JPG)
> **EN:** 2017, the beginning of a new beginning at Sítio Sasaki. Planting the first experimental agroforestry module, 100m2. Yumi, mother and aunt. They have been on the same land since 1950…
> **PT:** 2017, início do recomeço no Sítio Sasaki. Plantio do primeiro módulo agroflorestal experimental, 100m2. Yumi, mãe e tia. Elas, desde 1950 na mesma terra…
>
> ---

[![sasaki-2016.png](https://cdn.charmverse.io/user-content/fa5063ad-9188-4ac3-9f20-8e52fee6fa5c/780de33d-9e2c-4693-9e11-31ca360ac34e/sasaki-2016.png)](https://cdn.charmverse.io/user-content/fa5063ad-9188-4ac3-9f20-8e52fee6fa5c/780de33d-9e2c-4693-9e11-31ca360ac34e/sasaki-2016.png)
> 2016

---

[![sasaki-2024.png](https://cdn.charmverse.io/user-content/fa5063ad-9188-4ac3-9f20-8e52fee6fa5c/549994be-27a2-4ec0-b106-288a01c258f6/sasaki-2024.png)](https://cdn.charmverse.io/user-content/fa5063ad-9188-4ac3-9f20-8e52fee6fa5c/549994be-27a2-4ec0-b106-288a01c258f6/sasaki-2024.png)
> 2024
> 
> ---
> 
[![IMG_0086.JPG](https://cdn.charmverse.io/user-content/fa5063ad-9188-4ac3-9f20-8e52fee6fa5c/59825f91-da6a-4306-8ab4-a63065146c11/IMG_0086.JPG)](https://cdn.charmverse.io/user-content/fa5063ad-9188-4ac3-9f20-8e52fee6fa5c/59825f91-da6a-4306-8ab4-a63065146c11/IMG_0086.JPG)
**EN:** Agroecological vegetable garden. 250m2 dedicated to subsistence vegetable cultivation, sharing with the community, possible sale and seed multiplication.
**PT:** Hortão agroecológico. 250m2 dedicados ao cultivo de horta para subsistência, partilha com comunidade, eventual venda e multiplicação de sementes.

---

[![IMG_5051_Original.jpeg](https://cdn.charmverse.io/user-content/fa5063ad-9188-4ac3-9f20-8e52fee6fa5c/a785f514-bc76-4f58-92ad-24a4e0236dd9/IMG_5051_Original.jpeg)](https://cdn.charmverse.io/user-content/fa5063ad-9188-4ac3-9f20-8e52fee6fa5c/a785f514-bc76-4f58-92ad-24a4e0236dd9/IMG_5051_Original.jpeg)
> **EN:** Sketch of the Agroforestry System #5, focusing on roots and citrus fruits.
> **PT:** Croqui do SAF5, com foco em raízes e cítricos.

---

[![IMG_5039_Original.jpeg](https://cdn.charmverse.io/user-content/fa5063ad-9188-4ac3-9f20-8e52fee6fa5c/8376b0c1-0379-4cf7-8fde-565b6ea1a10b/IMG_5039_Original.jpeg)](https://cdn.charmverse.io/user-content/fa5063ad-9188-4ac3-9f20-8e52fee6fa5c/8376b0c1-0379-4cf7-8fde-565b6ea1a10b/IMG_5039_Original.jpeg)
> **EN:** Implementing Agroforestry System #5
> **PT:** Implementação do SAF5

metadata.title: Sasaki Agroforestry
metadata.description:
**EN:** The Sasaki Farm, located in São Miguel Arcanjo/SP, belongs to a family of **Japanese immigrants** from the far north of Japan who **arrived in Brazil in 1930** and have lived there **since 1950**. Until 1990, the family conventionally planted fruits and vegetables. In 2017, after decades without agricultural production, the third generation of the family learned about Agroforestry techniques and felt it could be a possible way to **revitalize that ancestral space**. The family began to implement small modules of **Agroecological Agroforestry Systems** to regenerate the site with **biodiversity, abundance and cultural recovery**. Currently, the site has 1 hectare of Agroforestry Systems and Mandalas of medicinal herbs. In addition to Successional Agroforestry techniques, we apply **Soil Health** techniques, such as Bokashi, Microorganisms, Biofertilizers and Pfeiffer Chromatography. 

**Goals for Summer / 2025**

1) Management of the Agroforestry System #5 (focus on roots and citrus fruits);
2) Planting of 500m² of corn and beans for seed multiplication.

> ---
> 
**PT:** O Sítio Sasaki, localizado em São Miguel Arcanjo / SP, é de uma família de imigrantes japoneses, do extremo norte do Japão, que chegou ao Brasil em 1930 e onde vivem desde 1950. Até 1990, a família plantava frutas e vegetais de forma convencional. Em 2017, após décadas sem produção agrícola, a terceira geração da família conheceu as técnicas de Agrofloresta e sentiu que poderia ser uma maneira possível de revitalizar aquele espaço ancestral. A família começou a implementar pequenos módulos de Sistemas Agroflorestais Agroecológicos para regenerar o sítio com biodiversidade, abundância e resgate cultural. Atualmente, o local conta com 1 hectare de cultivo de Sistemas Agroflorestais e Mandalas de ervas medicinais. Além das técnicas de Agrofloresta Sucessional, aplicamos técnicas de Sáude no Solo, como Bokashi, Microorganismos, Biofertilizantes e Cromatografia de Pfeiffer.

**Metas para Verão / 2025**

1) Manejo do SAF 5 (foco em raízes e cítricos)
2) Plantio de roça de 500m² de milho e feijão para multiplicação de sementes.

project.title: Ybirá
project.description:
# 🌳 YBIRÁ 🌳

YBIRÁ has its origins in Tupi-Guarani and means "tree", "that which grows from the ground" or "that which comes from the earth.

Location: São José farm, rural area, Marechal Deodoro, AL, North East, Brazil.
Total Size: 10 hectares / Initial Area: 4.9 hectares

📍Location: https://maps.app.goo.gl/C1fYNcWbwpQSF8Z17
[![MAPA-FAZENDA.jpeg](https://cdn.charmverse.io/user-content/518fd2f7-01d9-4158-9364-24a53077f87c/1ed109c1-0139-4b08-b6ee-695aced0db43/MAPA-FAZENDA.jpeg)](https://cdn.charmverse.io/user-content/518fd2f7-01d9-4158-9364-24a53077f87c/1ed109c1-0139-4b08-b6ee-695aced0db43/MAPA-FAZENDA.jpeg)

In August 2024 we started and you will be able to follow the development of activities from the very beginning. 

Currently most of the area is covered by pastures, but little by little we will transform it into a food forest for animals and humans.

Our mission is to restore and regenerate ecosystems through sustainable agroforestry practices, promoting harmony between agricultural production and environmental preservation. We seek to increase land productivity, improve soil quality, and strengthen local communities by offering sustainable and profitable alternatives for agriculture.

# Activities developed:


The farm had been abandoned for more than 5 years. We are slowly revitalizing the area due to the limited availability of financial resources.


We started by cutting down the weeds on the property and fencing areas 1 and 2 to protect our first plantations from trampling by neighboring cattle, which enter our area due to the lack of effective fences.

We use thrush cuttings harvested on the farm.

[![WhatsApp-Image-2024-10-11-at-20.30.29.jpeg](https://cdn.charmverse.io/user-content/518fd2f7-01d9-4158-9364-24a53077f87c/f993c5f6-56df-4a5a-8f6c-7858e292842b/WhatsApp-Image-2024-10-11-at-20.30.29.jpeg)](https://cdn.charmverse.io/user-content/518fd2f7-01d9-4158-9364-24a53077f87c/f993c5f6-56df-4a5a-8f6c-7858e292842b/WhatsApp-Image-2024-10-11-at-20.30.29.jpeg)

We received several donations of seeds and seedlings and inputs authorized by organic agriculture.


[![WhatsApp-Image-2024-09-27-at-20.43.32.jpeg](https://cdn.charmverse.io/user-content/518fd2f7-01d9-4158-9364-24a53077f87c/542219af-89c2-4fd4-bad2-9250c0154d49/WhatsApp-Image-2024-09-27-at-20.43.32.jpeg)](https://cdn.charmverse.io/user-content/518fd2f7-01d9-4158-9364-24a53077f87c/542219af-89c2-4fd4-bad2-9250c0154d49/WhatsApp-Image-2024-09-27-at-20.43.32.jpeg)
Me and my mother, who has a farm in Ecovila Riacho Doce. Donation of vinegar seeds.

We sowed using cuttings and seeds.

[![WhatsApp-Image-2024-09-27-at-20.42.46.jpeg](https://cdn.charmverse.io/user-content/518fd2f7-01d9-4158-9364-24a53077f87c/91d295f8-9d53-43c6-b1a2-1164d34befdf/WhatsApp-Image-2024-09-27-at-20.42.46.jpeg)](https://cdn.charmverse.io/user-content/518fd2f7-01d9-4158-9364-24a53077f87c/91d295f8-9d53-43c6-b1a2-1164d34befdf/WhatsApp-Image-2024-09-27-at-20.42.46.jpeg)

We planted seedlings of native species in the riparian forest of Lagoa Manguaba.

[![WhatsApp-Image-2024-09-18-at-15.26.38-(4).jpeg](https://cdn.charmverse.io/user-content/518fd2f7-01d9-4158-9364-24a53077f87c/5df8687b-2772-4cda-ad4c-007e8b06a7e8/WhatsApp-Image-2024-09-18-at-15.26.38-(4).jpeg)](https://cdn.charmverse.io/user-content/518fd2f7-01d9-4158-9364-24a53077f87c/5df8687b-2772-4cda-ad4c-007e8b06a7e8/WhatsApp-Image-2024-09-18-at-15.26.38-(4).jpeg)

We built our first seedling nursery, which is not yet finished.

[![9b6db4d6-9f80-4128-8c40-1267c568709e.jpeg](https://cdn.charmverse.io/user-content/518fd2f7-01d9-4158-9364-24a53077f87c/aedde8ed-044e-479b-a10e-e2e362f0c5e1/9b6db4d6-9f80-4128-8c40-1267c568709e.jpeg)](https://cdn.charmverse.io/user-content/518fd2f7-01d9-4158-9364-24a53077f87c/aedde8ed-044e-479b-a10e-e2e362f0c5e1/9b6db4d6-9f80-4128-8c40-1267c568709e.jpeg)

We built the compost bin with old coconut trees and thrush cuttings harvested on the farm, to recycle organic waste and generate fertilizer for the soil.

[![989c1661-760b-4b45-a44b-02dd46b55da3.jpeg](https://cdn.charmverse.io/user-content/518fd2f7-01d9-4158-9364-24a53077f87c/9fd7d5a1-9d36-4e83-8fad-25ee5314bdc0/989c1661-760b-4b45-a44b-02dd46b55da3.jpeg)](https://cdn.charmverse.io/user-content/518fd2f7-01d9-4158-9364-24a53077f87c/9fd7d5a1-9d36-4e83-8fad-25ee5314bdc0/989c1661-760b-4b45-a44b-02dd46b55da3.jpeg)


Our composter was recognized by @Atlantis_p2p on X:
https://x.com/Atlantis_p2p/status/1862476143623848023
[Click here to see](https://x.com/Atlantis_p2p/status/1862476143623848023)

We finally started our first agroforestry beds.

[![30039c58-3057-4976-bbe7-5a8b2a7719ee.jpeg](https://cdn.charmverse.io/user-content/518fd2f7-01d9-4158-9364-24a53077f87c/2f20c063-3ff7-445c-b033-74bfa5f95d51/30039c58-3057-4976-bbe7-5a8b2a7719ee.jpeg)](https://cdn.charmverse.io/user-content/518fd2f7-01d9-4158-9364-24a53077f87c/2f20c063-3ff7-445c-b033-74bfa5f95d51/30039c58-3057-4976-bbe7-5a8b2a7719ee.jpeg)

🌱[watch the video]🌱(https://x.com/lucena_luc22719/status/1865601926835933662)

[My son drinking water straight from the spring that supplies us](https://x.com/lucena_luc22719/status/1865607349395657083)


The plumbing at this spring needs to be renewed.

[![dd09f40e-0580-49a7-b3d6-d339e4bc7e96.jpeg](https://cdn.charmverse.io/user-content/518fd2f7-01d9-4158-9364-24a53077f87c/9ca609b4-5042-4438-8d9b-a9e4727d7fb3/dd09f40e-0580-49a7-b3d6-d339e4bc7e96.jpeg)](https://cdn.charmverse.io/user-content/518fd2f7-01d9-4158-9364-24a53077f87c/9ca609b4-5042-4438-8d9b-a9e4727d7fb3/dd09f40e-0580-49a7-b3d6-d339e4bc7e96.jpeg)

Spring area:
[![7f6094cd-4ba2-42fa-82af-ed3f27b81cb7.png](https://cdn.charmverse.io/user-content/518fd2f7-01d9-4158-9364-24a53077f87c/a5934a50-ffb5-49fc-8116-f56159f2dffb/7f6094cd-4ba2-42fa-82af-ed3f27b81cb7.png)](https://cdn.charmverse.io/user-content/518fd2f7-01d9-4158-9364-24a53077f87c/a5934a50-ffb5-49fc-8116-f56159f2dffb/7f6094cd-4ba2-42fa-82af-ed3f27b81cb7.png)

We are starting the Jackfruit harvest and we want to benefit this food that is so important for the local bioeconomy.

[![1d98bd51-4762-4ea7-9cfa-f050ac9be24e.jpeg](https://cdn.charmverse.io/user-content/518fd2f7-01d9-4158-9364-24a53077f87c/4e8466e3-9bc0-4e64-90a1-8d2175b77560/1d98bd51-4762-4ea7-9cfa-f050ac9be24e.jpeg)](https://cdn.charmverse.io/user-content/518fd2f7-01d9-4158-9364-24a53077f87c/4e8466e3-9bc0-4e64-90a1-8d2175b77560/1d98bd51-4762-4ea7-9cfa-f050ac9be24e.jpeg)



# Planning for the coming months:

• Benefit from jackfruit in its various possibilities, such as making shredded green jackfruit for vegan food;
• Buy a fruit dehydrator to take advantage of the jackfruit, cashew and mango harvest to dehydrate these 3 seasonal fruits;
• Install irrigation and purchase a tractor to increase the agroforestry area in area 3;
• Buy materials and inputs to complete the seedling nursery to expand sowing for agroforestry;
• Install a small agroforestry chicken coop for nutrient cycling and egg production;
• Revitalize area 2 (housing) to begin receiving groups of students, farmers and customers to exchange experiences and volunteer.
• The area has great tourist potential as it is located on the edge of the Manguaba lagoon, which can be worked on in the future


## 🍃 We are currently able to generate income for 2 employees from the local community. We count on your support to increase our activities and generate an inspiring and relevant socio-environmental impact in the region. 🍃

[![WhatsApp-Image-2024-09-27-at-20.42.46.jpeg](https://cdn.charmverse.io/user-content/518fd2f7-01d9-4158-9364-24a53077f87c/91d295f8-9d53-43c6-b1a2-1164d34befdf/WhatsApp-Image-2024-09-27-at-20.42.46.jpeg)](https://cdn.charmverse.io/user-content/518fd2f7-01d9-4158-9364-24a53077f87c/91d295f8-9d53-43c6-b1a2-1164d34befdf/WhatsApp-Image-2024-09-27-at-20.42.46.jpeg)

We planted seedlings of native species in the riparian forest of Lagoa Manguaba.

[![WhatsApp-Image-2024-09-18-at-15.26.38-(4).jpeg](https://cdn.charmverse.io/user-content/518fd2f7-01d9-4158-9364-24a53077f87c/5df8687b-2772-4cda-ad4c-007e8b06a7e8/WhatsApp-Image-2024-09-18-at-15.26.38-(4).jpeg)](https://cdn.charmverse.io/user-content/518fd2f7-01d9-4158-9364-24a53077f87c/5df8687b-2772-4cda-ad4c-007e8b06a7e8/WhatsApp-Image-2024-09-18-at-15.26.38-(4).jpeg)

We built our first seedling nursery, which is not yet finished.

[![9b6db4d6-9f80-4128-8c40-1267c568709e.jpeg](https://cdn.charmverse.io/user-content/518fd2f7-01d9-4158-9364-24a53077f87c/aedde8ed-044e-479b-a10e-e2e362f0c5e1/9b6db4d6-9f80-4128-8c40-1267c568709e.jpeg)](https://cdn.charmverse.io/user-content/518fd2f7-01d9-4158-9364-24a53077f87c/aedde8ed-044e-479b-a10e-e2e362f0c5e1/9b6db4d6-9f80-4128-8c40-1267c568709e.jpeg)

We built the compost bin with old coconut trees and thrush cuttings harvested on the farm, to recycle organic waste and generate fertilizer for the soil.

[![989c1661-760b-4b45-a44b-02dd46b55da3.jpeg](https://cdn.charmverse.io/user-content/518fd2f7-01d9-4158-9364-24a53077f87c/9fd7d5a1-9d36-4e83-8fad-25ee5314bdc0/989c1661-760b-4b45-a44b-02dd46b55da3.jpeg)](https://cdn.charmverse.io/user-content/518fd2f7-01d9-4158-9364-24a53077f87c/9fd7d5a1-9d36-4e83-8fad-25ee5314bdc0/989c1661-760b-4b45-a44b-02dd46b55da3.jpeg)


Our composter was recognized by @Atlantis_p2p on X:
https://x.com/Atlantis_p2p/status/1862476143623848023
[Click here to see](https://x.com/Atlantis_p2p/status/1862476143623848023)

We finally started our first agroforestry beds.

[![30039c58-3057-4976-bbe7-5a8b2a7719ee.jpeg](https://cdn.charmverse.io/user-content/518fd2f7-01d9-4158-9364-24a53077f87c/2f20c063-3ff7-445c-b033-74bfa5f95d51/30039c58-3057-4976-bbe7-5a8b2a7719ee.jpeg)](https://cdn.charmverse.io/user-content/518fd2f7-01d9-4158-9364-24a53077f87c/2f20c063-3ff7-445c-b033-74bfa5f95d51/30039c58-3057-4976-bbe7-5a8b2a7719ee.jpeg)

🌱[watch the video]🌱(https://x.com/lucena_luc22719/status/1865601926835933662)

[My son drinking water straight from the spring that supplies us](https://x.com/lucena_luc22719/status/1865607349395657083)


The plumbing at this spring needs to be renewed.

[![dd09f40e-0580-49a7-b3d6-d339e4bc7e96.jpeg](https://cdn.charmverse.io/user-content/518fd2f7-01d9-4158-9364-24a53077f87c/9ca609b4-5042-4438-8d9b-a9e4727d7fb3/dd09f40e-0580-49a7-b3d6-d339e4bc7e96.jpeg)](https://cdn.charmverse.io/user-content/518fd2f7-01d9-4158-9364-24a53077f87c/9ca609b4-5042-4438-8d9b-a9e4727d7fb3/dd09f40e-0580-49a7-b3d6-d339e4bc7e96.jpeg)

Spring area:
[![7f6094cd-4ba2-42fa-82af-ed3f27b81cb7.png](https://cdn.charmverse.io/user-content/518fd2f7-01d9-4158-9364-24a53077f87c/a5934a50-ffb5-49fc-8116-f56159f2dffb/7f6094cd-4ba2-42fa-82af-ed3f27b81cb7.png)](https://cdn.charmverse.io/user-content/518fd2f7-01d9-4158-9364-24a53077f87c/a5934a50-ffb5-49fc-8116-f56159f2dffb/7f6094cd-4ba2-42fa-82af-ed3f27b81cb7.png)

We are starting the Jackfruit harvest and we want to benefit this food that is so important for the local bioeconomy.

[![1d98bd51-4762-4ea7-9cfa-f050ac9be24e.jpeg](https://cdn.charmverse.io/user-content/518fd2f7-01d9-4158-9364-24a53077f87c/4e8466e3-9bc0-4e64-90a1-8d2175b77560/1d98bd51-4762-4ea7-9cfa-f050ac9be24e.jpeg)](https://cdn.charmverse.io/user-content/518fd2f7-01d9-4158-9364-24a53077f87c/4e8466e3-9bc0-4e64-90a1-8d2175b77560/1d98bd51-4762-4ea7-9cfa-f050ac9be24e.jpeg)



# Planning for the coming months:

• Benefit from jackfruit in its various possibilities, such as making shredded green jackfruit for vegan food;
• Buy a fruit dehydrator to take advantage of the jackfruit, cashew and mango harvest to dehydrate these 3 seasonal fruits;
• Install irrigation and purchase a tractor to increase the agroforestry area in area 3;
• Buy materials and inputs to complete the seedling nursery to expand sowing for agroforestry;
• Install a small agroforestry chicken coop for nutrient cycling and egg production;
• Revitalize area 2 (housing) to begin receiving groups of students, farmers and customers to exchange experiences and volunteer.
• The area has great tourist potential as it is located on the edge of the Manguaba lagoon, which can be worked on in the future


## 🍃 We are currently able to generate income for 2 employees from the local community. We count on your support to increase our activities and generate an inspiring and relevant socio-environmental impact in the region. 🍃

project.title: Sana Floresta
project.description:
[![Header.jpg](https://cdn.charmverse.io/user-content/3698d89a-4a7b-42e6-bcaf-ddbaa8b57946/db8c8a9f-4b91-40af-8284-c450d9cfece4/Header.jpg)](https://cdn.charmverse.io/user-content/3698d89a-4a7b-42e6-bcaf-ddbaa8b57946/db8c8a9f-4b91-40af-8284-c450d9cfece4/Header.jpg)
[[PORTUGUÊS]](https://app.charmverse.io/agroforestdao/sana-floresta-portugu-s-7199046892435381)
# / Sana Floresta


### _A scaleable agroforest project for the Brazilian Atlantic Forest_

Sana Floresta is an organic agroforestry project located in Vale do Ribeira, Brazil, in the heart of the Atlantic Forest, one of the most biodiverse ecosystems in the world. Our region has a long history of large-scale banana production, reliant on heavy pesticide use, which has led to significant environmental degradation and health risks for local communities and wildlife.

The project began in 2018, when the first soil preparations were made on a degraded pasture. By the end of 2019, the first area of 6 hectares was already planted. After five years, the cultivation has evolved into a beautiful agroforest with over 16 diverse species of fruits and timber, and the area now spans 20 hectares.

[![Screenshot-2024-09-12-at-19.11.57.png](https://cdn.charmverse.io/user-content/3698d89a-4a7b-42e6-bcaf-ddbaa8b57946/a963d0cd-f96e-46c6-ae0a-54699d864921/Screenshot-2024-09-12-at-19.11.57.png)](https://cdn.charmverse.io/user-content/3698d89a-4a7b-42e6-bcaf-ddbaa8b57946/a963d0cd-f96e-46c6-ae0a-54699d864921/Screenshot-2024-09-12-at-19.11.57.png)
*Our plantations.*

With each expansion, we have carefully refined our layout to create a scalable and replicable model that can be easily adopted by other farmers in the region. In addition to our current production of organic bananas, we are also focusing on increasing the quantities of cacao and juçara planted in the agroforest.

We have a strong commitment to promoting biodiversity and ecological restoration, aiming for at least 50% of the species in our plantations to be native. Through the development of large agroforests, we seek to create new habitats for wildlife, thereby contributing to the recovery of local ecosystems.

### Regenerate the ecosystem, revitalize the region, and improve the quality of life for all beings: Human, Animal, and Plant.

To contribute to the overall health of our ecosystem, we have also recently started working with native stingless bees. These essential pollinators have suffered significant declines in their populations due to pesticide use. Their presence is crucial for maintaining biodiversity and ensuring vibrant forests, as well as healthy agricultural productivity.




**Location:** Rod. BR116 Km439, Arapongal - Registro
**Total área planted:** 20,85 hectares
**Biome:** Atlantic Forest
**Google Earth link:** [Sana Floresta](https://www.google.com/maps/d/edit?mid=1RNZLDXrwKEzOhTyI3TSt-jX0YQeAr_s&usp=sharing)



# / Objectives

1. **Economic** - Prove profitability (of regenerative cultivation).

2. **Social** - Improve the quality of life of workers, families, and the local community.

3. **Ecological** - Regenerate the ecosystem, increase biodiversity, and provide a refuge for wildlife.

4. **Organic** - We cultivate without the use of chemical products, promoting the health of workers, communities, animals, and plants. 

5. **More valued products** - We produce high-quality local foods, developing the regional economy and fairly remunerating workers. We meet the growing demand for organic products with ethical commitment, quality, and socio-environmental responsibility.

6. **Long-term benefits** - By reducing opur carbon footprint and preserving natural resources, we ensure the vitality of the soil for future generations.

# / Our agroforest model

**We are in constant expansion.** Initially starting with 6 hectares, we have now reached 20 hectares planted. This expansion is driven by the sale of organic bananas and is what makes this large-scale agroforestry model viable. 

[![Screenshot-2024-10-01-at-18.29.09.png](https://cdn.charmverse.io/user-content/3698d89a-4a7b-42e6-bcaf-ddbaa8b57946/cbeaf4e8-a957-49fa-957d-f29886992cb5/Screenshot-2024-10-01-at-18.29.09.png)](https://cdn.charmverse.io/user-content/3698d89a-4a7b-42e6-bcaf-ddbaa8b57946/cbeaf4e8-a957-49fa-957d-f29886992cb5/Screenshot-2024-10-01-at-18.29.09.png)
_SAF Ribeira and Extensions 1 & 2_

Banana trees grow very quickly and produce shade delaying growth of all younger plants coming beneath. This delay allows for a few years of strong banana production, as banana trees love ample sunlight. Underneath, the saplings grow and slowly reach for the sunlight, and after four years, we can see the first mahogany trees breaching the banana canopy.  



[![Screenshot-2024-09-12-at-19.11.57.png](https://cdn.charmverse.io/user-content/3698d89a-4a7b-42e6-bcaf-ddbaa8b57946/fa9f7d17-475a-43aa-a675-09ac451de524/Screenshot-2024-12-08-at-20.53.45.png)](https://cdn.charmverse.io/user-content/3698d89a-4a7b-42e6-bcaf-ddbaa8b57946/fa9f7d17-475a-43aa-a675-09ac451de524/Screenshot-2024-12-08-at-20.53.45.png)

Over time, banana production in each agroforest area is expected to decline due to the shading by upper canopy species. However, by the time this occurs, banana sales will have financed further expansions into new areas, and other planted fruits will start coming into production. 

**Fruit species planted:**

Banana (Maça Princesa)
Avocado
Cravo Lemon
Juçara
Jackfruit
Achachairu
Cacao
Grumixama
Cupuaçu 
Papaya

**Wood species planted:** 

Guanandi, 
African Mahogany 
Ingá
Jatobá
Copaíba
Eucalyptus
Junteira 



## **Wildlife sighting**

In september, 2024, a puma was seen walking with its cub in this area. A few days later it would hunt and eat a few ducks leaving this footprint nearby.


[![onçaparda.jpg](https://cdn.charmverse.io/user-content/3698d89a-4a7b-42e6-bcaf-ddbaa8b57946/00b4d788-2fdd-421f-9a79-11549d257e0b/onçaparda.jpg)](https://cdn.charmverse.io/user-content/3698d89a-4a7b-42e6-bcaf-ddbaa8b57946/00b4d788-2fdd-421f-9a79-11549d257e0b/onçaparda.jpg)[](https://cdn.charmverse.io/user-content/3698d89a-4a7b-42e6-bcaf-ddbaa8b57946/00b4d788-2fdd-421f-9a79-11549d257e0b/onçaparda.jpg)






# Goals & Objectives
### 2024



**STINGLESS BEE KEEPING**

- Produce 80 traps for stingless bees of various sizes and types and spread them across the farm.

- Capture 15 swarms of stingless bees.

[![mosaico_bees.jpg](https://cdn.charmverse.io/user-content/3698d89a-4a7b-42e6-bcaf-ddbaa8b57946/ce1d4493-6fca-4cad-a8b6-23a7ecca50e0/mosaico_bees.jpg)](https://cdn.charmverse.io/user-content/3698d89a-4a7b-42e6-bcaf-ddbaa8b57946/ce1d4493-6fca-4cad-a8b6-23a7ecca50e0/mosaico_bees.jpg)

_Atualização (4/12/24)_

- Of the 13 swarms captured so far, 4 have abandoned the traps. In two cases, the reason was ant attacks. OBSERVATION: I noticed that near watercourses, especially the Ribeira River, the capture rate is much higher.

**AGROFOREST DEVELOPMENT**

1. Purchase more seedlings to enrich new areas and for replanting.

29/10/24

Purchased from Dna Irene (Iguape):

500 seedlings - Guanandi 

800 seedlings - Cinnamon 

1300 seedlings - Grumixama 

500 seedlings - Jatobá

[![DSC02811.jpg](https://cdn.charmverse.io/user-content/3698d89a-4a7b-42e6-bcaf-ddbaa8b57946/45416310-adad-40ef-a0a8-79b5742f9633/DSC02811.jpg)](https://cdn.charmverse.io/user-content/3698d89a-4a7b-42e6-bcaf-ddbaa8b57946/45416310-adad-40ef-a0a8-79b5742f9633/DSC02811.jpg)
_Arrival at farm 31/10/24_

_2. Make Cacao and Cupuaçu seedlings_

[![mosaicoCacau.jpg](https://cdn.charmverse.io/user-content/3698d89a-4a7b-42e6-bcaf-ddbaa8b57946/5a957d29-047b-48b3-9702-b28c2801c7bf/mosaicoCacau.jpg)](https://cdn.charmverse.io/user-content/3698d89a-4a7b-42e6-bcaf-ddbaa8b57946/5a957d29-047b-48b3-9702-b28c2801c7bf/mosaicoCacau.jpg)
- Production of 750 Cocoa seedlings and 100 Cupuaçu seedlings from seeds.

3. Plant Cocoa in 60% of consolidated areas of SAF Ribeira, including extensions (where there is shade), and 30% in the new areas where there is also shade.

### 2025

Construct our own seedling nursery.

[![Sunset.jpg](https://cdn.charmverse.io/user-content/3698d89a-4a7b-42e6-bcaf-ddbaa8b57946/c4b128eb-193e-4636-a035-58359d23ef26/Sunset.jpg)](https://cdn.charmverse.io/user-content/3698d89a-4a7b-42e6-bcaf-ddbaa8b57946/c4b128eb-193e-4636-a035-58359d23ef26/Sunset.jpg)

[![mosaicoCacau.jpg](https://cdn.charmverse.io/user-content/3698d89a-4a7b-42e6-bcaf-ddbaa8b57946/5a957d29-047b-48b3-9702-b28c2801c7bf/mosaicoCacau.jpg)](https://cdn.charmverse.io/user-content/3698d89a-4a7b-42e6-bcaf-ddbaa8b57946/5a957d29-047b-48b3-9702-b28c2801c7bf/mosaicoCacau.jpg)
- Production of 750 Cocoa seedlings and 100 Cupuaçu seedlings from seeds.

3. Plant Cocoa in 60% of consolidated areas of SAF Ribeira, including extensions (where there is shade), and 30% in the new areas where there is also shade.

### 2025

Construct our own seedling nursery.

[![Sunset.jpg](https://cdn.charmverse.io/user-content/3698d89a-4a7b-42e6-bcaf-ddbaa8b57946/c4b128eb-193e-4636-a035-58359d23ef26/Sunset.jpg)](https://cdn.charmverse.io/user-content/3698d89a-4a7b-42e6-bcaf-ddbaa8b57946/c4b128eb-193e-4636-a035-58359d23ef26/Sunset.jpg)

project.title: Morro da Redenção | Redemption Hill
project.description:
(Para a versão em português role para baixo)

# 🫘 A Laboratory for Rural Cyberstigmergy

[![saf-mar-o-2024.jpg](https://i.postimg.cc/3r6HxrkQ/saf-mar-o-2024.jpg)](https://postimg.cc/V5jh789K)

About:

Redemption Hill is situated in the state of Minas Gerais, [Brazil](https://pt.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ficheiro:Brazil_Municipalities.png), in the mountains of Mantiqueira and in the border of Ibitipoca State Park. Minas Gerais is a state full of small rural towns, each one autonomous with its own production of meat, alcohol and milk production 🐄

[![tabelamunicipios.png](https://i.postimg.cc/pdQ3K7D2/tabelamunicipios.png)](https://postimg.cc/yJdfHLQ5)

Since colonization, monocultures and the destruction of the forests and indigenous culture shaped the societies of this state. Nowadays the state still has a significant rural population, that has been suffering the effects of rural exodus for almost 100 years. We respect their traditional agriculture and are aligning the syntropic nests and biomass management along with the rice, corn, peanuts and beans production 🌾

[![vista-de-cima-fev-27.jpg](https://i.postimg.cc/bvB8Z48s/vista-de-cima-fev-27.jpg)](https://postimg.cc/JyZSg6sL)

It's way too common in Minas that many of the younger generations don't want to continue the dairy management of the small family farm, but lack the means and connections to establish productive and regenerative uses of the land, and often lease it to cattle ranchers. The Hill local multisig is composed by the Siblings Tatiane e Tarcisio Oliveira and Diogo Jorge as mentor. Together with Augusta, her mother they care very well for us workers. The rest of the family also helps out during high activity moments.

[![Tati-e-Dona-Augusta.png](https://i.postimg.cc/MTLv2xDD/Tati-e-Dona-Augusta.png)](https://postimg.cc/XGwVdRtG)
Tatiane and Dona Augusta

[![Ferramentascasarao.png](https://i.postimg.cc/d07px3PV/Ferramentascasarao.png)](https://postimg.cc/JyLpy1zf)
Family receiving tools gifted by the[$EARTH](https://www.solarpunkdao.earth/) coin project 

🌱  The concept of community agriculture is something unusual today, but that existed before colonization, indigenous tribes managed intergenerational food forests that were able to generate enough resources and sustain the tribe with enough seeds to keep cultivating the common wealth. 

[![aveia-alta.jpg](https://i.postimg.cc/HnRGvmJM/aveia-alta.jpg)](https://postimg.cc/5QBkjZS9)


[Redemption Hill](https://app.charmverse.io/agroforestdao/1-morro-da-reden-o-redemption-hill-6615434124234358) is an experiment to revive community agriculture in the 21st century. Locally, we are becoming a showcase of Food Forest oriented not to the local market, but to the local, regional and global communities. Purposeful communities value moments, experiences, relations, dedication, diversity, density, quality, and services for multiplication of systems, for biomass production, for culture building, etc. Many of these interactions and qualities can be attested onchain.

[![arroz.jpg](https://i.postimg.cc/6QYm1KgQ/arroz.jpg)](https://postimg.cc/wtR27C6K)

In return, besides grains, roots, fruits, knowledge and social ties, the Lab is prototypes agroecological web3 primitives such as [Beans Vouchers](https://opensea.io/assets/matic/0x2953399124f0cbb46d2cbacd8a89cf0599974963/16035713671248468345278117419798488907003509257501192821112201412580552474634), the [Banana Splits](https://youtu.be/ZHFRJT1fJjE) for recognition tokens, and the [Redemption Nests NFTs](https://opensea.io/collection/ninhos-da-redencao), to fund the co-stewardship of nests.

[![ninhos-referencia-1920x1080.png](https://i.postimg.cc/rpmqjx90/ninhos-referencia-1920x1080.png)](https://postimg.cc/pmwNX94R)

[![4.gif](https://i.postimg.cc/TPmCZH0Z/4.gif)](https://postimg.cc/t1q36kL5)

This year we hosted a local and a regional school, and hosted an experience of agroforestry, rural living and... tech! We believe rural tech doesn't have to be only about IOT devices, AI or Remote Sensing, but also community building. 

[![1estudantestodos.jpg](https://i.postimg.cc/YqMK8Qrr/1estudantestodos.jpg)](https://postimg.cc/SjTvx2Y3)

We also try to bring a contemplative experience of seasonality to the online tech and ReFi community (usually young urban dwellers, that are building the digital tools for regeneration, but that lack long term successional experiences), by sharing Redemption Hill [news](https://x.com/agroforestDAO).

[![twittersaf.png](https://i.postimg.cc/rs8C6R4X/twittersaf.png)](https://postimg.cc/8J0rM5wt)

The Hill has provided ingredients for 2 traditional meals that we organize in Rio de Janeiro together with local web3 communities such as ReRe and Rio Crypto Hub, during ETH Rio. 

[![feijoadasafa.png](https://i.postimg.cc/0yNWMFbR/feijoadasafa.png)](https://postimg.cc/fJ6j1HcB)


🌴 Redemption Hill Goals:

1. To establish lines with forest species for the production of biomass, wood and fruits. 
2. To produce annual crops between shrub and green manure lines
3. To serve as a p2p rooted laboratory and engage with local schools and with the DAO
4. To pay costs of managing the system during the rainy season from November to March
5. To organize regional events with members of the DAO

Thank you so much!!!
🫘🌱🍌🐜🐝🌾🌴


# 🫘 Um Laboratório de Cyberestigmergia Rural

[![saf-mar-o-2024.jpg](https://i.postimg.cc/3r6HxrkQ/saf-mar-o-2024.jpg)](https://postimg.cc/V5jh789K)

Sobre:

O Morro da Redenção está situado no estado de Minas Gerais, [Brasil](https://pt.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ficheiro:Brazil_Municipalities.png), na serra da Mantiqueira e na divisa do Parque Estadual do Ibitipoca. Minas Gerais é um estado repleto de pequenas cidades rurais, cada uma autônoma com produção própria de carne, álcool e produção de leite 🐄

[![tabelamunicipios.png](https://i.postimg.cc/pdQ3K7D2/tabelamunicipios.png)](https://postimg.cc/yJdfHLQ5)

Desde a colonização, as monoculturas e destruição das florestas e da cultura indígena moldaram as sociedades deste estado. Hoje o estado ainda possui uma população rural significativa, que sofre os efeitos do êxodo rural há quase 100 anos. Respeitamos a agricultura tradicional e estamos alinhando os ninhos sintrópicos e o manejo da biomassa com a produção de arroz, milho, amendoim e feijão 🌾

[![vista-de-cima-fev-27.jpg](https://i.postimg.cc/bvB8Z48s/vista-de-cima-fev-27.jpg)](https://postimg.cc/ JyZSg6sL)

É muito comum em Minas que muitas das gerações mais jovens não queiram continuar a gestão leiteira da pequena fazenda familiar, mas carecem de meios e conexões para estabelecer usos produtivos e regenerativos da terra, e muitas vezes a arrendam para pecuaristas. . A multisig local do Morro é composta pelos Irmãos Tatiane e Tarcísio Oliveira e Diogo Jorge como mentor. Juntamente com a Augusta, sua mãe, eles cuidam muito bem de nós, trabalhadores. O resto da família também ajuda de diversas formas nos momentos de beneficiamento e alta atividade.

[![Tati-e-Dona-Augusta.png](https://i.postimg.cc/MTLv2xDD/Tati-e-Dona-Augusta.png)](https://postimg.cc/XGwVdRtG)
Tatiane and Dona Augusta

[![Ferramentascasarao.png](https://i.postimg.cc/d07px3PV/Ferramentascasarao.png)](https://postimg.cc/JyLpy1zf)
Família recebendo ferramentas doadas pelo projeto de moedas[$EARTH](https://www.solarpunkdao.earth/) 

🌱 O conceito de agricultura comunitária parece algo pouco comum hoje em dia, mas que existia antes da colonização, as tribos indígenas administravam florestas alimentares intergeracionais que eram capazes de gerar recursos suficientes e sustentar a tribo com sementes suficientes para continuar cultivando a riqueza comum. 

[![aveia-alta.jpg](https://i.postimg.cc/HnRGvmJM/aveia-alta.jpg)](https://postimg.cc/5QBkjZS9)


[Redemption Hill](https://app.charmverse.io/agroforestdao/1-morro-da-reden-o-redemption-hill-6615434124234358) é um experimento para reviver a agricultura comunitária no século XXI. 

Localmente, estamos cultivando uma agrofloresta que não é diretamente orientada para o mercado local, mas para construir bens comuns para as comunidades locais, regionais e globais. Comunidades de propósito valorizam momentos, experiências, relações, dedicação, diversidade, densidade, qualidade e serviços como multiplicação de sistemas, para produção de biomassa, para construção de cultura, etc. Muitas dessas interações e qualidades podem ser atestadas onchain e ser reconhecidas e recompensada por uma comunidade de pares, que humildemente chamamos de Sociedade Enraizada.

[![arroz.jpg](https://i.postimg.cc/6QYm1KgQ/arroz.jpg)](https://postimg.cc/wtR27C6K)

Além de produzir grãos, raízes, frutas, conhecimento e vínculos sociais, o Laboratório é um solo fértil para inovações usando blockchain, como por exemplo, uma forma de pré-venda de lavouras, os NFTs [vale-feijão](https://opensea.io/assets/matic/0x2953399124f0cbb46d2cbacd8a89cf05999749 63/16035713671248468345278117419798488907003509257501192821112201412580552474634), o conceito [Banana Splits](https://youtu.be/ZHFRJT1fJjE) para tokens para reconhecimento da multiplicação de bananas, e os [Ninhos da Redenção NFTs](https://opensea.io/collection/ninhos-da-redencao), para dividir os custos anuais de manejo de consórcios chamados de ninhos.

[![ninhos-referencia-1920x1080.png](https://i.postimg.cc/rpmqjx90/ninhos-referencia-1920x1080.png)](https://postimg.cc/pmwNX94R)

[![4.gif](https://i.postimg.cc/TPmCZH0Z/4.gif)](https://postimg.cc/t1q36kL5)

Este ano acolhemos uma escola local e uma regional, e acolhemos uma experiência de agrossilvicultura, vida rural e tecnologia! Acreditamos que a tecnologia rural não envolve apenas dispositivos IOT, IA, sensoriamento remoto ou agricultura de precisão, mas também construção de comunidades autonomas. 

[![1estudantestodos.jpg](https://i.postimg.cc/YqMK8Qrr/1estudantestodos.jpg)](https://postimg.cc/SjTvx2Y3)

Também tentamos trazer uma experiência contemplativa de sazonalidade para a comunidade online de tecnologia e ReFi (geralmente jovens moradores urbanos, que estão construindo as ferramentas digitais para a regeneração, mas que carecem de experiências sucessionais de longo prazo), compartilhando Redemption Hill [notícias](https ://x.com/agroforestDAO).

[![twittersaf.png](https://i.postimg.cc/rs8C6R4X/twittersaf.png)](https://postimg.cc/8J0rM5wt)

O Morro contribuiu com ingredientes para 2 refeições tradicionais que organizamos no Rio de Janeiro em conjunto com comunidades locais da web3 como ReRe e Rio Crypto Hub, durante a ETH Rio. 

[![feijoadasafa.png](https://i.postimg.cc/0yNWMFbR/feijoadasafa.png)](https://postimg.cc/fJ6j1HcB)


🌴 Metas do Morro da Redenção:

1. Estabelecer linhas com espécies florestais para produção de biomassa, madeira e frutos. 
2. Produzir culturas anuais entre linhas de arbustos e adubos verdes
3. Servir como um laboratório p2p enraizado e interagir com escolas locais
4. Pagar os custos de gestão do sistema durante a estação chuvosa de novembro a março
5. Organizar eventos regionais com membros da DAO


🐝🐝🐝 Aqui está o primeiro grupo de aprendizes da AgroforestDAO...

[![printsessao4geral.png](https://i.postimg.cc/sfZ7KZnN/printsessao4geral.png)](https://postimg.cc/Rq4WZqx7)

... construindo perfis em nosso [Espaço de trabalho Charmverse](https://app.charmverse.io/agroforestdao/page-509537591950876) 🐜 🐜 

[![aprendizesnocharm.png](https://i.postimg.cc/Z5jd0PRC/aprendizesnocharm.png)](https://postimg.cc/K1kzHMt2)

🙏 Agradecemos a oportunidade de coordenar com tantos projetos maravilhosos na AgroforestDAO 🫘🌱🍌🐜🐝🌾🌴
